name: Microsoft Defender Tamper Protection Trigger
description: Detects block of attempt to disable real time protection of Microsoft Defender by tamper protection
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:5013 AND Value:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Ss][Pp][Yy][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\ \=\ 0[Xx]1\(\)/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll]\-[Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee]\ [Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ \=\ \([Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt]\)/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:5013 AND Value:(*\\Windows\ Defender\\DisableAntiSpyware\ \=\ 0x1\(\) OR *\\Real\-Time\ Protection\\DisableRealtimeMonitoring\ \=\ \(Current\)))`
